1.content:
Meet your boss.

Maggie Fields- CEO and Founder of the company you work for. She is a tall and well-built woman in her mid-thirties. She has a Masters degree in Business and a good size fortune. She makes sure her staff is cared for in more ways than one.

The question is who are you?
1.title: Well, you are hired.

11.content:
Kari, 19 year old. You got hired as an intern, as you go to college for your degree online and living on your own for the first time ever. So now you are working as one of the office interns, though the office you are working in is the CEO’s office.

Zoey, 23 years old. You a college graduate that spent a year seeing the world and having no responsible. But now you need a good career, lucky you just landed a good job. You got hired as the personal assistant for the CEO.

Jessica, 28 years old. You tried to start your own company a few years ago instead of going to college. You were successful for years before your company started to fail. Then your company got bought out by the same company that offered you a job. You were going to work as the clerk for the very person how took your company away from you.

Olivia, 31 years old. You had a normal live and normal career until you got hired at this company as an Ads designer. You are really artistic and love to party.

So which of these are you?
11.title: Who is the new hire

111.content: How does Kari end up in diapers?
111.title: Kari

choices: You hold it until you get to your floor
You get off the elevator on an earlier floor, to find a bathroom
You lose control and wet yourself
1111.content:
You started your day, with you finished your second energy drink for the day as you finished an exam, before you had to head to work at the office. You were glad you got the chance to be an intern for this large company. You grabbed a breakfast bar as you knew you had to get to work. You looked at yourself in the mirror and saw you look ready for work. You rushed out of the small apartment and started the ride on the subway to work.

After a half hour on the subway, you arrived at the main office building. You got into the elevator and hit the button go to the top floor. You started to squirm as you knew you need to pee.
1111.title: Kari has accidents as work.

choices: the IT guys reported their findings from Kari's PC
1112.content:
Kari likes to wear diapers. She loves the softness of them. She loved the comfort and security they offered. She loved using them too. She felt naughty when she was using them.

Her CEO found out about them, when....
1112.title: Kari likes to wear diapers.

1113.content: She was wearing diapers for other reasons. She was wearing because she was....
1113.title: Other

choices: on the way to the bathroom

114.content: How does Olivia end up in diapers?
114.title: Olivia

12.content:
Daniel, 18 years old. You just finished high school and to be honest you are really unremarkable and you only got a job, because your Mother and Maggie Fields were friends back in their high school days.(Your Mother was 18 years old, when you were born)

Mark, 27 years old. You founded your own company serval years. It was pretty successful until it came to a hard price war, and you only lost it because Maggie's company had the bigger Fonds. In the end she purchased your company for far less than it was actually worth. At least she offered you a job.


John, 22 years old. You a college graduate Now you need a good career, lucky you just landed a good job.

Samuel, 35 years old. You went to high school with Maggie. She used to bully you without mercy. Somehow you end up working for her company.
12.title: Boy

122.content: How does Mark get diapered?
122.title: Mark

info.brief_description: You end up being diapered by your new boss.
info.description: Congrats, you just got hired for a new job at powerful company with great benefits. There is a problem with your boss though. Due to situations that happen at work, she wants to diaper and possible baby you. What will happen to your boss, your new job and you?
